price: 64. Diles (¡oh, Muhammad!): “¿¡Me ordenan adorar a otro que no sea Al-lah, ustedes, ignorantes!?”.
arabic: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأۡمُرُوٓنِّيٓ أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qul afaghayra al-lahi tamurūnnī aʿbudu ayyuhā al-jāhilūna
